title: Bank Earnings and Inside the New Fight for Equality
itunes:title: Bank Earnings and Inside the New Fight for Equality
description:
Anton Schutz, President at Mendon Capital Advisors and Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Michelle Davis, breaks down bank earnings and the outlook for the year ahead. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek P&I Reporter Susan Berfield talk about why the U.S. needs more Covid testing and how Minnesota has found a way. Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg News Federal Reserve Reporter Catarina Saraiva discuss the story “The Fed Wakes Up to Race: Inside the New Fight for Equality.” And we Drive to the Close with JJ Kinahan, Chief Market Strategist at TD Ameritrade.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
